channel.title: About on Jan-Philipp Fränken
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jan-Philipp Fränken

item.title: About
item.description: Short Bio -- I am a 2-year PhD Student at The University of Edinburgh. My interests are in the domain of program induction and probabilistic reasoning. I am also interested in the development of formal and interactive multi-player experiments. Publications 2021 Fränken, J.P., Pilditch, T.D. (2021). Cascades across networks are sufficient for the formation of echo chambers: An agent-based model. Journal of Artificial Societies a nd Social Simulation. PDF|GitHub To a great mind, nothing is little --
